headline: Risk Assets Rally on Macro Relief

sections.the_day: Bitcoin climbed above $91k while Ethereum reclaimed $3k, extending a broad rally across risk assets. Both majors posted their strongest single-day gains in over a fortnight. Volumes were elevated but not exceptional—this was steady accumulation rather than speculative frenzy. No single catalyst dominated headlines; instead, a confluence of diminishing macro anxiety lifted sentiment.
sections.the_move_explained: The rally appears rooted in stabilizing bond yields and softening dollar strength, both of which tend to precede crypto upside. Correlation with tech equities remained tight—when Nasdaq rallied 1.8%, digital assets followed with beta. This wasn't crypto-native news driving price; it was macro conditions becoming less hostile.
sections.into_tonight: Asian session liquidity will test whether this momentum holds without Western participation. Watch for profit-taking near resistance levels if volumes thin.
